original_text: The Lord did not punish Israel's people as much as he punished their enemies. He did not kill them as much as he killed their enemies.
korean_text: 주께서 그 백성을 치셨던들 그 백성을 친 자들을 치심과 같았겠으며 백성이 죽임을 당하였던들 백성을 죽인 자가 죽임을 당함과 같았겠느냐

sentences.original_text: The Lord did not punish Israel's people
as much as he punished their enemies
as much as he killed their enemies
